attributes.action: Stop UK airports from charging for passenger drop off’s
attributes.additional_details: Historically, there were no drop off charges at airports and services kept moving smoothly - there is no rationale of imposing charges now.
attributes.background: Charging 2-5 pounds for 10 minutes when dropping off passengers at various UK airports is causing unnecessary financial  burden on passengers and relatives and causes a negative impression in regard to provision of public services.
